bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Test Procedures for Antennas
IEEE Standard Test Procedures for Antennas

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is used throughout government, industry and academia in the area of antenna testing. It provides many of the procedures currently used by antenna test organization. However, the technology has passed the standard by in the areas and many areas and equipment are not included. This update will include these.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
